text: All the action you see going on in the picture. Now honey, I had it was in the kitchen and I was the oldest of ten. And if we made a mess like that, you'd get a kick in the ass. Okay, I want you to tell me all the action that's going on in that picture. Well, we have a spilling of the water. And the kid with his cookie jar. And a stool is turned over. And the mother's running the water on the floor. I don't know what else you want from that. . Looks like somebody's laying out in the grass. Doesn't . it? And the kid in the cookie jar in a tilted stool. What more do you want? The water rolling on the floor?
